content.description:
Looking for an easy well bolted route to practice your multi pitch skills? Look no further. 3 pitches of well bolted sports clipping. Skip the lines on Big Bad Wolf and check this thing out. Please utilize the local limestone and stay off wet red rock! This route needs traffic and some brushing but will clean up nicely. Don't mistake this for the route to the left as that one is run out.

 1p 50 feet 4 bolts 5.5 2p 100 feet 8 bolts 5.6 3p 100 feet 9 bolts 5.6

 3 rappels with a single 60 or 2 rappels with two 60s. You can also hike off to the north on the main hiking trail
content.location: Go up the biggest gully on the WSW face.Â

content.description:
Another easy multipitch on the southwest face. First pitch is runout and the second pitch will probably feel spicy for the 5.7 leader. If you want well protected, hop on the route to the right. Bring a brush and help clean this up.

 1p 110 feet 3 bolts 5.4r 2p 125 feet 8 bolts 5.7

 This route is not set for rappelling; at top anchor scramble 25 feet up and right to the anchor of the route to right and rappel that route. Alternatively you can walk down the hikers trail from the summit.
content.location: At the top of the gully. Left of the 2 routes.
